Text: i wouldn't touch this with a barge pole and not because its a GB but ware is the 350 mb version

And I, and some others wouldn't touch a 350MB version, because they look like crap on a *large* screen. What's your point. If you don't like something or don't have the equipment to do them justice, move on to whatever floats your boat!

I appreciate the 99hifi releases.
